âœ… Automated Twitter Posts
âœ… Gmail Email Replies

This tool allows you to write posts & reply to comments in seconds inside your favorite apps.

The tool will generate additional interface under each Twitter & LinkedIn comment for you to interact with.

You can select:

- Emotion. The post or comment will be written in the selected emotion.
- Keyword. The post or comment will be written around that keyword and include the keyword in the response.

Create automated posts & replies with different emotions:
happy, excited, positive, neutral or angry!

Add specific keyword, so that AI would include that keyword in your post or comment reply! Keyword can be anything - single word, a website or a phrase. AI will smartly input into the flow of text and topic.

Apps supported so far:

- LinkedIn
- Twitter
- Gmail

Grow your impressions by 200% with a lot less time spent!
